common.something_went_wrong: Kwenzeka okuthile okungakunamnandi. Ngiyaloba zama futhi.

home.title: Rejista Yomazwi Ezempi Yezisulelo
home.subtitle: Okwakela abadlali kule Aferika
home.description: I-NSER iyiredista eyenziwe ngokuzithandela yokupilanisa ekhaya lapho abantu bangakwazi ukuzibeka ngebang lokuhlobana nemisebenzi yomdlalo.

about.title: Mayelana Ne-NSER
about.description: Irejista Yomazwi Ezempi Yezisulelo (NSER) ingumkhakhalwane owakusekelwe ukusiza abantu abukhele izinhlelo zabo zokudlala.
about.mission_text: Ukunikeza indawo ephakeme, elindile, nelula abantu abangazisulela ngokhululeka emisebenzi yomdlalo yabamcintiswano abahubeni.
about.vision_text: Isiko lapho ukuphalaza ngamadlalo kuyavikwa ngezindlela zamazwe ezenzekelele kanye nemikhuba yomdlalo owanele.
about.how_it_works_text: Fundisa isulelo sakho nge-NSER, futhi sizotshela onke abamcintiswano abahubeni. Isulelo sakho siyabophezela emthethweni.

self_exclude.title: Fundisa Isulelo
self_exclude.subtitle: Zilawule umdlalo wakho
self_exclude.description: Isulelo yindlela ezenzekelele yokuvula abantu ekudlaleni. Uma ufundisa nge-NSER, onke abamcintiswano abahubeni banelungile ukuzikela ngokusifakla.
self_exclude.privacy_agree: Ngikhumbula ukuthi imininingwane yami izosetshenziswa ukulungiselela lesisulelo
self_exclude.success_message: Isulelo sakho sezimu sangena umsebenzi ngempumelelo
self_exclude.confirmation_text: Unqoba ukuthatha izinga lokufundisa lesulelo. Lolu mzamo ubophezela emthethweni.

questions.question: I-NSER ingubani?
questions.answer: I-NSER iyiredista eyenziwe ngokuzithandela yokupilanisa ekhaya yasizekeliso abantu abangazisulela emisebenzi yomdlalo yabamcintiswano.

questions.question: Isulelo siyasebenza kanjani?
questions.answer: Uma ufundisa nge-NSER, sizotshela onke abamcintiswano abahubeni abenza incazo yokuzikela ngokusifakla emathaphu ekusulwa.

questions.question: Isulelo siyabophezela emthethweni?
questions.answer: Yebo, isulelo esifundiswe nge-NSER siyabophezela emthethweni. Abamcintiswano kufanele bathathe isulelo.

questions.question: Ngingakwazi ukulingisa isulelo sami ngesikhatshi?
questions.answer: Ukulingisa isulelo ngesikhatshi kuthengeka kuya nakwizindlela ozibonele. Xhumana nencazelo ye-NSER.

questions.question: Ingabe imininingwane yami iyimfihlelo?
questions.answer: Yebo, imininingwane yakho iyokungcwalelwa futhi iyohlanganyela nje nabamcintiswano abahubeni abadinga ukwenzela isulelo.

questions.question: NSER ingubani?
questions.answer: I-NSER iyomuntu onomuntu owezwa ekufanele ukubalulelela izinhlelo zayo zokudlala futhi ayifun zisulele.

questions.question: Abamcintiswano bani abahubeni e-NSER?
questions.answer: Abamcintiswano amaningi amakulu kule Aferika bahubeni e-NSER. Jwayeleza uhlu lwethu labamcintiswano ukuze kuthwale imininingwane.

questions.question: Isulelo sinqobela isikhathi esingakanani?
questions.answer: Ungakhetha amathaphu esulelo okuqalisa izinyanga eziyisithupha kuya ekusuleleni umuntu wonke insuku.

contact.title: Xhumana Nathi
contact.subtitle: Silapha okunizaneni
contact.description: Imibuzo emaxezeni ne-NSER? Xhumana nomusizo wethu.
contact.name: Igama Eliphelele
contact.subject: Iisihloko
contact.error: Kunivalela kuthumela umyalezo. Ngiyaloba zama futhi.
